SEARCH
Package Network.ServerSide

Interface RemoteServerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteServerImplementation
public interface RemoteServerInterface extends Remote
This Class is the RemoteServer Interface sent to the RemoteClients as a stub. Through this Interface the RemoteClient can invoke the available methods of the RemoteServer using the RMI Communication Protocol

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onMessage(Message message)
    This method allows a RemoteClient to send any tipe of Message to the RemoteServer
    TileReplyMessage
    onTilePickMessage(String nickname, int x, int y)
    This method allows a RemoteClient to ask the RemoteServer to pick a PlayableItemTile from the LivingRoom
    InsertionReplyMessage
    ToPutTileRequestMessage(int xPos, int yPos, PlayableItemTile tile, int numOfTiles)
    This method allows a RemoteClient to ask the RemoteServer to put the first picked PlayableItemTile into the Shelf
    InsertionReplyMessage
    ToPutTileRequestMessage(int xPos, PlayableItemTile tile, int numOfTiles)
    This method allows a RemoteClient to ask the RemoteServer to put the second or third picked PlayableItemTile into the Shelf
    void
    verifyStillConnected()
    This method allows a RemoteClient to verify if the RemoteServer is still on and running

  • Method Details

    • onMessage

      void onMessage(Message message) throws RemoteException
      This method allows a RemoteClient to send any tipe of Message to the RemoteServer
      Parameters:
      message - the Message to be sent
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • verifyStillConnected

      void verifyStillConnected() throws RemoteException
      This method allows a RemoteClient to verify if the RemoteServer is still on and running
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onTilePickMessage

      TileReplyMessage onTilePickMessage(String nickname, int x, int y) throws RemoteException
      This method allows a RemoteClient to ask the RemoteServer to pick a PlayableItemTile from the LivingRoom
      Parameters:
      nickname - a String containing the nickname of the Player that is asking to pick a PlayableItemTile
      x - the 'x' position in the LivingRoom of the PlayableItemTile to pick in the LivingRoom
      y - the 'y' position in the LivingRoom of the PlayableItemTile to pick
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • ToPutTileRequestMessage

      InsertionReplyMessage ToPutTileRequestMessage(int xPos, int yPos, PlayableItemTile tile, int numOfTiles) throws RemoteException
      This method allows a RemoteClient to ask the RemoteServer to put the first picked PlayableItemTile into the Shelf
      Parameters:
      xPos - the 'x' position in the Shelf of the PlayableItemTile will be put
      yPos - the 'y' position in the Shelf where the PlayableItemTile will be put
      tile - the PlayableItemTile to put into the Shelf
      numOfTiles - the total number of PlayableItemTiles to put into the Shelf
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • ToPutTileRequestMessage

      InsertionReplyMessage ToPutTileRequestMessage(int xPos, PlayableItemTile tile, int numOfTiles) throws RemoteException
      This method allows a RemoteClient to ask the RemoteServer to put the second or third picked PlayableItemTile into the Shelf
      Parameters:
      xPos - the 'x' position in the Shelf of the PlayableItemTile will be put
      tile - the PlayableItemTile to put into the Shelf
      numOfTiles - the total number of PlayableItemTiles to put into the Shelf
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection
